description:
When it comes to versatility, plan on plaid. The Groveland Shirt plaid to be exact. Designed with slightly exaggerated checks for a stand-out look, this men's shirt can be worn solo or layered up depending on the weather.

But all-season style isn't the only reason to love the Groveland Shirté It has a great sustainability story too. Made from 80% organic cotton and 20% recycled polyester, this is one piece you can add to your wardrobe with piece-of-mind.
name: Prana Groveland Shirt - Standard - Mens
